attributes.action: Exterior "No Cycling" signs changed to say "No Cycling Above Walking Pace"
attributes.background:
All exterior signs that say "No Cycling" changed to signs that say "No Cycling Above Walking Pace".

Cycling on pavements and in pedestrianised areas at walking pace is safe. Just use common sense like when walking.

rejection.details:
Your petition asks for signs to be changed, but in fact it seems that you would like the law against cycling on the pavement to be relaxed.

If that is the case, you could start a new petition asking Parliament to change the law.
